Type Method# build_filter(_:_:)

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
static func build_filter<LHS, RHS>(
    _ lhs: LHS,
    _ builder: (PredicateExpressions.Variable<LHS.Output.Element>) -> RHS
) -> PredicateExpressions.Filter<LHS, RHS> where LHS : PredicateExpression, RHS : PredicateExpression, LHS.Output : Sequence, RHS.Output == Bool
```
